oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: All Star Western Theatre - Content for 1948-03-27 broadcast - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of All Star Western Theatre radio program featuring Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage, with announcer Terry O'Sullivan. Disc was recorded November 11, 1947; content appears in the March 27, 1948 broadcast with commercials and station announcements included. This disc appears to be the raw studio recording, with TR001516 being the broadcast recording.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Foy Willing; Riders Of The Purple Sage
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme (Drifting Along, Singing A Song) -- Opening statement (Terry O'Sullivan) -- When Payday Rolls Around (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) -- Foy Willing talks -- I Wonder Where You Are Tonight (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) -- Drifting Along, Singing A Song (instrumental) -- Terry O'Sullivan introduces the Riders Of The Purple Sage -- Get Along Home Cindy (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) -- Terry O'Sullivan introduces the Riders Of The Purple Sage -- Over The Santa Fe Trail (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) -- Terry O'Sullivan introduces the radio play -- Radio play 'Five Quarters' (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: All star western theatre (Radio program); Willing, Foy, 1914-1978; Riders of the Purple Sage; Sloey, Al; Paul, Johnny (Violinist); O'Sullivan, Terry, 1915-2006; Farnworth, Scott; Wilson, Ray (Writer); Butterfield, Herbert; Drake, Daphne; Howard, Fred, 1896-1990; Preston, Lou
